#summary How to build this project code?

= Introduction =

This project develop under [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven].
So you need to setup maven first.

All prebuild for download links available here after:
|| [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=GwtSecurity-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar&can=2&q= GwtSecurity-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar] || Primary Library  ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=GssDemo-Simple-1.0-SNAPSHOT.war&can=2&q= GssDemo-Simple-1.0-SNAPSHOT.war] || Simple demostration using spring security for security only without integration with any spring bean .||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=GssDemo-GwtSL-1.0-SNAPSHOT.war&can=2&q= GssDemo-GwtSL-1.0-SNAPSHOT.war] || Secure demostration  if you're using  [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-sl/ gwt-sl] with spring integration .  ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=GssDemo-spring4gwt-1.0-SNAPSHOT.war&can=2&q= GssDemo-spring4gwt-1.0-SNAPSHOT.war] || Secure demostration  if you're using  [http://code.google.com/p/spring4gwt/ spring4gwt] with spring integration .  ||

= Details =

 Because this project develop by [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven],
 you should download [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=GwtSecurity.zip&can=2&q= sources], unpack to directory and run command
  'mvn install'
 to install library to your local repository.

 [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-sl/ gwt-sl] and [http://code.google.com/p/spring4gwt/ spring4gwt] dosn't provide by public maven respository,<br/>so I reorganized their sources to fit as maven project , 
 you also need to download relative maven project [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=gwt-sl-1.2.zip&can=2&q= here] and [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=gwt-sl-1.2.zip&can=2&q= here], <br/>unpack and install them.

 Finally, [http://code.google.com/p/gwtsecurity/downloads/detail?name=gwt-sl-1.2.zip&can=2&q= download] , unpack and execute "mvn package" to build the demostration app.
